update CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL_HISTORY set QUALIFICATION_NO = #{qualificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_VALID_DATE = #{businessValidDate,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILD_DEPT_LOOK = #{childDeptLook,jdbcType=CHAR}, CERTIFY_NO = #{certifyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, BUSINESS_EXPIRE_DATE = #{businessExpireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, LICENSE_NO = #{licenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, LICENSE_EXPIRE_DATE = #{licenseExpireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDUCATIOIN = #{educatioin,jdbcType=CHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, CERTIFY_TYPE = #{certifyType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENSE_VALID_DATE = #{licenseValidDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ADDERSS = #{adderss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUTY = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=CHAR} where HISTORY_ID = #{historyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select QUALIFICATION_NO,BUSINESS_NO, to_char(BUSINESS_VALID_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "BUSINESS_VALID_DATE", cad.STATUS,CHANNEL_NAME,CERTIFY_NO, to_char(BUSINESS_EXPIRE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "BUSINESS_EXPIRE_DATE", cad.LICENSE_NO,cad.TEL,SEX, to_char(LICENSE_EXPIRE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "LICENSE_EXPIRE_DATE", EMAIL,EDUCATIOIN,cad.FAX, to_char(BIRTHDAY,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "BIRTHDAY", CERTIFY_TYPE,cad.CHANNEL_CODE, to_char(LICENSE_VALID_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "LICENSE_VALID_DATE", ADDERSS,MOBILE,cad.POST_CODE,DUTY, CONTRACT_NO,TITLE,CHILD_DEPT_LOOK, BANK_NODE,BANK_ACCOUNT,REMARK,CHANNEL_CATEGORY,MISTAKE_CONTENT,BANK_PROVINCE, BANK_RECEIVE,FINANCE_FLAG,CHANNEL_TYPE,pb.DEPT_CODE,OFFICE_ADDRESS,BANK_NAME, CONTACT,BUSINESS_LINE,CHANNEL_FEATURE,BANK_CITY,MISTAKE_FLAG, CHANNEL_FLAG,CHANNEL_RATE,pb.DEPT_CODE || '-' || dept_simple_name dept_simple_name, to_char(QUALIFICATION_VALID_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "QUALIFICATION_VALID_DATE", to_char(QUALIFICATION_EXPIRE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "QUALIFICATION_EXPIRE_DATE" from CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL_HISTORY cad left join CHANNEL_MAIN_HISTORY pb on pb.History_Id = cad.History_Id left join DEPARTMENT dept on pb.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE where cad.HISTORY_ID = #{historyId} and pb.VALID_IND = 1 and cad.VALID_IND = 1 and dept.VALID_IND = 1

when.test: endpoint!=null and endpoint != '' and startpoint != null and startpoint != ''

mapper.insert: insert into CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL_HISTORY ( ) select QUALIFICATION_NO, #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_NO, BUSINESS_VALID_DATE, sysdate, STATUS, CHANNEL_NAME, CHILD_DEPT_LOOK, CERTIFY_NO, VALID_IND, sysdate, BUSINESS_EXPIRE_DATE, LICENSE_NO, TEL, SEX, LICENSE_EXPIRE_DATE, EMAIL, EDUCATIOIN, FAX, #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY, CERTIFY_TYPE, CHANNEL_CODE, LICENSE_VALID_DATE, #{historyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDERSS, MOBILE, POST_CODE, DUTY, CONTRACT_NO, TITLE, QUALIFICATION_VALID_DATE, QUALIFICATION_EXPIRE_DATE from channel_agent_detail cmd where cmd.channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cmd.valid_ind = '1'
